name: RawMagnifier
desc: A common base class for magnifiers.

fields.name: child
fields.desc: An optional widget to position inside the len of the [RawMagnifier].

fields.name: clipBehavior
fields.desc: Whether and how to clip the parts of [decoration] that render inside the loupe.

fields.name: focalPointOffset
fields.desc: The offset of the magnifier from [RawMagnifier]'s center.

fields.name: magnificationScale
fields.desc: How "zoomed in" the magnification subject is in the lens.

nodes.name: Custom decoration shape for RawMagnifier
desc: Customize the five-pointed star decoration shape here
